Inspired by the Indian national football team coach and manager Syed Abdul Rahim, who is regarded as the architect of Indian football.

A mob boss must deal with a disgruntled mistress and a vanishing bag of cocaine.

Column1: Lagaan: Once Upon a Time in India

Agent Sai Srinivasa Athreya is an authentic humorous investigative thriller revolving around the adventures of a detective based out of Nellore.

Indian army special forces execute a covert operation, avenging the killing of fellow army men at their base by a terrorist group.
In the rural heartlands of India, an upright police officer sets out on a crusade against violent caste-based crimes and discrimination.

The murder of a youngster creates confusion among cops when they discover the suspect has a lookalike.

Expelled from his school, a 16-year old boy returns home to his abusive and oppressive father.
The story of a young revolutionary who raised an armed resistance against the British rule in India.

Based on the life of Patna-based mathematician Anand Kumar who runs the famed Super 30 program for IIT aspirants in Patna.
Revolves around the mysterious death of India's 2nd Prime Minister Shri Lal Bahadur Shastri and attempts to uncover if he had actually died a natural death, or, as alleged, was assassinated.
Munna Bhai embarks on a journey with Mahatma Gandhi in order to fight against a corrupt property dealer.

After a difficult romance in a class-divided society, the love birds find out marriage is not what they thought it would be.
A young man realizes that he has to push back against his domineering father if he wants to find true happiness and love.

The intrigue of the Shakespearean tragedy 'Macbeth' is transposed to the Mumbai underworld.
Amarendra Baahubali, the heir apparent to the throne of Mahishmati, finds his life and relationships endangered as his adoptive brother Bhallaladeva conspires to claim the throne.
Four youngsters arrive in a big city and their lives become interlinked.

A father and son help each other through growing up, romance, tragedy, and adventure.
In 2014, a group of Malayali nurses was captured when terrorists took over the city of Tikrit in Iraq. This movie recounts the ordeal suffered by the nurses following their capture.
A law student witnesses deception, homicide, and crime after being elected as General Secretary of his college.
A boxer struggles to make his mark in the boxing world.
A couple from Chandni Chowk aspire to give their daughter the best education and thus be a part of and accepted by the elite of Delhi.
Arjun Reddy, a short-tempered house surgeon, gets used to drugs and drinks when his girlfriend is forced to marry another person.

Former wrestler Mahavir Singh Phogat and his two wrestler daughters struggle towards glory at the Commonwealth Games in the face of societal oppression.
After he retires, an aging theatre actor and his wife begin to feel unwanted by their children.
In interior Maharashtra, a fisherman's son and a local politician's daughter fall in love against the restrictions of caste hierarchy.

Mahesh, a studio photographer and studio owner gets into a fight and loses. He ends up taking revenge which leads to certain realizations in his life.

When three young women are implicated in a crime, a retired lawyer steps forward to help them clear their names.

Desperate measures are taken by a man who tries to save his family from the dark side of the law, after they commit an unexpected crime.
Desperate measures are taken by a man who tries to save his family from the dark side of the law after they commit an unexpected crime.
An experienced investigator confronts several conflicting theories about the perpetrators of a violent double homicide.
A depressed wealthy businessman finds his life changing after he meets a spunky and care-free young woman.
Along India's Ganges River, four people face prejudice, a strict moral code and a punishing caste system as they confront personal tragedies.
A story about a single woman (a Mom) and dreams on her Daughter.

Using only a hammer and a chisel, a man spends twenty-two years carving a road through a treacherous mountain.

An aspiring filmmaker goes through the ups and downs of romance when he falls for a Christian woman who says she only wants to be friends.

Through reincarnation, family members are able to cross generations and meddle in each others' lives.
A man goes to extreme lengths to save his family from punishment after the family commits an accidental crime.
The truth behind the ascension of Milkha Singh, who was scarred by of the India-Pakistan partition.

A Delhi girl from a traditional family sets out on a solo honeymoon after her marriage gets cancelled.

A mistaken delivery in Mumbai's famously efficient lunchbox delivery system connects a young housewife to an older man in the dusk of his life as they build a fantasy world together through ...

A clash between Sultan and Shahid Khan leads to the expulsion of Khan from Wasseypur, and ignites a deadly blood feud spanning three generations.
The account of Human Rights lawyer Shahid Azmi, an ordinary citizen with an extraordinary commitment to justice.
The story of Paan Singh Tomar, an Indian athlete and seven-time national steeplechase champion who becomes one of the most feared dacoits in Chambal Valley after his retirement.
Three young people learn that love can neither be defined nor contained by society's definition of normal and abnormal.
A shopkeeper takes God to court when his shop is destroyed by an earthquake.
An aimless, jobless, irresponsible grown man joins the army and matures into a battlefield hero.

After a police team kills his brother, a drug-dealing gangster vows to kill the entire team and their respective families.
Sadhu, an encounter specialist, is armed with a personal vendetta to find and kill the gangsters responsible for his wife's death.

A quiet, sweet tempered housewife endures small slights from her well-educated husband and daughter every day because of her inability to speak and understand English.

A retiring police officer remembers a thrilling case of his life which is not recorded in any case files.
A money-minded criminal has to deal with two rival gangs as well as an evil cop threatening his girlfriend.

A Kabbadi player rescues a young woman from an unwanted marriage and hides her in his home.

A school-teacher, who forces children to share their food with him, forbids one from entering the school until he brings his own Tiffin/Lunch-box.
A group of eight youngsters from an engineering college form an unbreakable friendship after going through various struggles together.
